Package extraction

Class FoxThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • extraction.FoxThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FoxThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Performs relation extraction using the FOX demo for relation extraction.
    Author:
    Nick Düsterhus, Lukas Blübaum, Monika Werner

    • Constructor Detail

      • FoxThread

        public FoxThread​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model graph,
                 java.io.File model,
                 java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.util.CoreMap>> articles)
        Constructor, initializes graph, model and BlockingQueue.
        Parameters:
        graph - An Apache Jena model this thread will write to.
        model - A file this thread will write the model to.
        articles - A BlockingQueue containing a List of CoreMaps (Stanford CoreNLP).

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​()
        Takes the next line from the blocking queue, then calls getRelationsFox(List) on this line. Writes the graph to a file.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getTriple

        private void getTriple​(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Statement statement,
                       org.apache.jena.rdf.model.StmtIterator iterator)
        Extracts subject predicate and object from a FOX response and writes the triple to the graph.
        Parameters:
        statement -
        iterator -

      • getRelationsFox

        private void getRelationsFox​(java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.util.CoreMap> sentences)
        Sends each sentence via the FoxWebservice to the FOX online demo and reads the returned model. Calls getTriple(Statement, StmtIterator) to iterate over the model.
        Parameters:
        sentences - A List of CoreMaps.
